reviews.review: if you have $20 laying around, and don't know what to use it on, use it on this and then play it without friends cause you have none and then get friends and then profit

Dead by daylight is the best game of this genre, HOWEVER, this game is truly terrible, the servers are bad and depending on where you are, will give you 200 ping always, the developers are making patches so slowly you can write what they did in 3 patches on a single paper

Dead by daylight is a terrible game, but it's terribly addictive, no other game (that has survived) has replicated the formula nor the gameplay loop that DBD has done, with Patch 5.3.0, they actually did 3 months of work for once, they're not terrible people, they're just trying their best to fix a spaghetti game

El juego en si es muy bueno pero hay cosas que me disgustan bastante, uno es que se te presentan errores al estar jugando y te saca de la partida perdiendo puntos por cuestiones que a¬øen ocasiones son de ellos, otro es que al momento de que se te va por un momento el Internet te saca, as√≠ que si tiene una mala conexi√≥n es injugable, y la ultima cosa es que √∫ltimamente hay malos asesinos los cuales no te dejan de acosar hasta que te maten, quitando en si las probabilidades de que juegues.

The concept of the game is fantastic, the gameplay...not so much (at least at higher levels). The devs don't really give a damn about  balance and it feels like they're trying to hold the surviors' hand more often than not. And before anybody says: "Quit whining killer main" I played both sides extensively and I felt the imbalance even as survivor. It just wasn't fun to be done with the game in 3 mins cuz all gens pop at once while you just held M1 and didn't even get chased because the killer simply had no chance to. The fact that the devs dont care was shown in the most recent devs stream when they were talking about MMR and the lead game designer basically said" Wouldn't it be nice if the MMR system actually worked as it should? Well fuck you it doesn't." This is a system they created and instead of fixing it they're just like: Oh Well lets give the killer more objectives cuz killers don't have to multitask enough"

So to sum up pretty much every chapter, every concept in the game and the game itself: Great concept, piss poor execution
Dead by Daylight is best horror and very funny game , i love this game very much
The game is nice, but after every update, it writes to the disc, not like other games, it writes to the disc very slowly, please I want you to find a solution to this problem.

Pretty fun game and not aggravating like some other multiplayer games.

Honestly, this game is a love-hate relationship. I'm fuckin drunk. This game gives me the best feeling when I'm getting chased by some bullshit fucking dumb killer and I manage to get myself downed. I love how loud this game is when I load in. It gives me an itch in my brain that I can't scratch unless I ended up scratching my head off enough to reach my brain. When I play Claudette I have a lot of fun looping the killer for 5 gens until I help my teammates escape, then I die because NOED lol. Pinhead was the greatest edition to the killers of this game. His m1 is not bullshit and doesn't hit me 100% of the time. I love this game. :) (smile)
You either hate hate it or love hate it.
